detail_desc: Suede boots with pointed toes. Satin linings and leather insoles. Heel 7.5 cm.
Sweatpants in a regular fit with an elasticated drawstring waist, slightly lower crotch, welt side pockets and a welt back pocket. Tapered legs with ribbed hems. Soft brushed inside.
Long-sleeved top in organic cotton jersey with a ribbed neckline.
Cotton poplin shorts with an elasticated drawstring waist, side pockets and a back pocket.
V-neck top in crinkled jersey with smocking at the waist and long, slightly wider sleeves with smocked cuffs.
Soft, non-wired bra in lace with removable inserts that shape the bust and provide good support. Adjustable shoulder straps, a hook-and-eye fastening at the back, and a wide lace trim at the hem.
Leggings in soft sweatshirt fabric. Skinny fit with an easy pull-on, elasticated waist.
Jumper in a soft, textured, pima cotton knit with ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Dress in jersey crêpe with a V-neck, wrapover top, 3/4-length sleeves and a seam under the bust with a detachable tie belt.
5-pocket jeans in washed, patterned stretch denim with detachable elastic braces and an adjustable elasticated waist with a press-stud.
Baby Exclusive. Long-sleeved top in soft, patterned sweatshirt fabric made from organic cotton. Gently dropped shoulders, buttons at the back of the neck and a soft brushed inside.
Short shorts in lightweight sweatshirt fabric with an elasticated, drawstring jersey waistband, side pockets and rounded hems.
T-shirt in soft washed cotton jersey with worn details and a text print on the front.
Leggings in jersey made from a soft, organic cotton blend with an elasticated waist. One patterned pair and one pair in a solid colour.
Bodysuit in soft, organic cotton jersey with a concealed press-stud on one shoulder, long sleeves and press-studs at the crotch.
Fine-knit trainer socks in a soft cotton blend with elasticated tops.
Pyjamas in soft cotton jersey. Long-sleeved top with ribbing around the neckline and cuffs. Bottoms with an elasticated waist and ribbed hems.
Long-sleeved top in printed cotton jersey with a rounded hem. Slightly longer at the back.
Cropped top in crushed velvet with thin elastic shoulder straps.

Dress in airy chiffon with embroidery on the front, a small stand-up collar, an opening with a button at the back of the neck, and a deeper opening at the front. Long sleeves with a flounce half-way down and elastication at the cuffs. Seam with concealed elastication at the waist. Jersey-lined front and a jersey underskirt.
Pull-on shorts in soft, stretch denim with an elasticated, drawstring waist, diagonal side pockets and a back pocket.
Short dress in woven fabric with a collar, buttons down the front and a yoke at the back. Narrow, detachable belt at the waist and long sleeves with buttoned cuffs. Unlined.
Glittery tights with a regular, elasticated waist.
Fine-knit socks in a soft cotton blend with high shafts and elasticated tops.
Soft cotton jersey leggings in different designs with an elasticated waist.
T-shirt in soft slub cotton jersey with a print motif on the front, short sleeves with sewn-in turn-ups, and short slits in the sides.
All-in-one suit in soft, patterned organic cotton sweatshirt fabric. Jersey-lined hood, zip down the front with a chin guard and wide, foldover ribbing at the cuffs and hems. Soft brushed inside.
Treggings in sturdy jersey with elastication and a press-stud at the waist and fake front pockets with zips.
Top in lightweight sweatshirt fabric with dropped shoulders, long sleeves and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem. Gently rounded hem. Slightly longer at the back.
A-line dress in glittery tulle with a small opening and button at the back of the neck, cap sleeves and a seam with a wide flounce at the hem. Lined.
Long-sleeved jumper in fine-knit cotton with ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Pyjama top and shorts in soft satin. V-neck cami top with adjustable spaghetti shoulder straps and lace at the top. Short shorts with narrow elastication at the waist and lace-trimmed hems.

Short running shorts in fast-drying functional fabric with elastication and a concealed drawstring at the waist and a concealed key pocket in the waistband. Layered over a pair of short running tights. Reflective details. The polyester content of the shorts is partly recycled.

Hoodie in soft sweatshirt fabric made from a cotton blend. Jersey-lined hood, kangaroo pocket, long, double-layer sleeves and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. The cotton content of the hoodie is organic.
Sunglasses with metal frames, plastic sidepieces and tinted, UV-protective lenses.

department_name: Denim wardrobe H&M man inactive from S.6
detail_desc: Suit waistcoat in woven fabric with lining fabric at the back. Buttons at the front, welt front pockets and an adjustable tab and metal fastener at the back. Lined. Skinny fit.
Striped jersey top in a soft cotton and modal blend with short sleeves, a chest pocket and rounded hem.
Block-coloured sports swimsuit with a zip at the top, small collar and long raglan sleeves. Lined at the front and gusset.
Sleeveless top in soft viscose jersey with lace over the shoulders. Round neckline with decorative gathers.

Short-sleeved shirt in an airy cotton weave with a tie or bow tie. Shirt with a collar, classic front, yoke with a pleat at the back and rounded hem. Pre-tied tie or bow tie with an elastic strap and adjustable plastic fastener.
Sports tights in fast-drying functional fabric with mesh sections and an elasticated waist with a concealed key pocket in the waistband.
Long-sleeved top in jersey crêpe with a deep V-neck and wrapover at the back.
Keyring in metal and faux fur. Length approx. 16 cm.

Lined triangle bikini top with narrow, adjustable shoulder straps that can be fastened in different ways at the back and cups with removable inserts that shape the bust and provide good support. Metal fastener at the back.
Metal earrings with faceted plastic beads and sparkly stones. Length 5.5 cm.
Sleeveless top in a plumeti-weave viscose blend with a V-neck at the front and stand-up collar with a drawstring.
Fully lined bikini bottoms with a mid waist, ties at the sides and medium coverage at the back.
Jumper in a soft, fine knit containing some wool with dropped shoulders, long sleeves and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Straight-cut top in a crêpe weave with narrow, adjustable shoulder straps and a frill trim at the top.
Hair elastics in a crêpe weave.
Belt in grained imitation leather with a metal buckle. Width approx. 2.2 cm.
V-neck top in patterned viscose jersey with 3/4-length sleeves that have a seam, pleats and a flounce.

Knee-length dress in softly draping satin with an opening and twisted detail at the front of the neckline and a small opening with a button at the back of the neck. Long sleeves, wide, buttoned cuffs and a seam at the waist with narrow, covered elastication. Unlined.
5-pocket, ankle-length jeans in washed, stretch denim with a high waist and straight, wide legs. The cotton content of the jeans is partly recycled.
Velour bracelet with a snap-on strap and soft toy head with embroidered details and appliqués. Size 3.5x20 cm.
Soft ankle boots in imitation suede. Faux fur linings and insoles and rubber soles.
Loose-fitting vest top in airy linen jersey with a V-neck.
Long-sleeved nightshirt in soft, lightweight cotton flannel with notch lapels, buttons down the front and a yoke with a pleat at the back. Open chest pocket, buttoned cuffs and a rounded hem.
Pouch bag in woven fabric with velour details and an embroidered motif on the front. Zip at the top and a wrist strap. Lined. Size 20x28 cm.
Off-the-shoulder playsuit in a viscose weave with elastication at the top, short, wide sleeves, and an elasticated seam at the waist.
Necklace of thin metal chains, two of which have a pendant. Adjustable length 42-50 cm.
Metal earrings in various designs. One pair of hoops, diameter 3 cm. One pair with a long metal chain and plastic stone at the bottom, length 9 cm.

Short dress in a patterned, crinkled viscose weave a deep V-neck with a tie-detail at the back. Open section with smocking at the back of the waist, 3/4 length trumpet sleeves and lace-trimmed flounces at the sleeves and hem. Unlined.
Trainers in imitation leather with a hook and loop fastening at the front. Fabric linings and insoles and patterned rubber soles.
Top in sweatshirt fabric with a motif in a relaxed fit with long sleeves and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Jumper in a soft knit containing some wool with dropped shoulders, long sleeves and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Long, oversized jacket in washed sweatshirt fabric with a lined drawstring hood, zip down the front and side pockets. Dropped shoulders, and ribbing at the cuffs and hem.

Short dress in textured satin with a unique nursing feature, V-neck and short flounced sleeves. Top layered over the dress with elastication, a frill trim and decorative lacing at the hem. The design includes a double layer at the top to help retain warmth while allowing easier nursing access.
Long-sleeved top in soft jersey with a print motif on the front and narrow ribbing around the neckline.
Cardigan in a soft fine merino wool knit with a V-neck, buttons down the front, long sleeves and ribbing at the cuffs and hem.

Biker jacket with quilted shoulders, a tab with a press-stud at the neck and a diagonal zip down the front. Zipped side pockets, a small decorative flap front pocket and long sleeves with sturdy ribbed jersey undersides and a zip at the cuffs. Lined.
Sports trousers in sturdy, fast-drying jersey with an elasticated drawstring waist, side pockets and a leg pocket with a taped zip. Slightly lower crotch and tapered legs with ribbed hems.
Sleeveless jumpsuit in lightweight, washed cotton denim with a flounce at the top and narrow, adjustable shoulder straps. Drawstring at the waist, diagonal side pockets and straight, 3/4-length legs.
Shirt in a linen and cotton weave with a grandad collar, buttons down the front, a chest pocket and short sleeves with sewn-in turn-ups.

Jacket in woven fabric with a wrapover front with a concealed fastening on the inside and tab with a metal fastener at one side. Welt front pockets with a flap, a slit at the cuffs and a single back vent. Lined.
Pyjamas in soft jersey. Wide, short-sleeved top with a print motif on the front. Short, patterned shorts with an elasticated waist.

Lightly padded jacket in windproof, water-repellent functional fabric with a detachable, lined hood, stand-up collar and zip down the front with a chin guard. Front pockets, elastication at the cuffs and reflective details. Lined. The jacket has a water-repellent coating without fluorocarbons.
Pyjama shorts in soft jersey with an elasticated waist and side pockets.
Ankle boots in imitation suede with pointed toes, a decorative bow over the foot, soft, stretchy shaft and covered heels. Imitation leather insoles. Heel 8 cm.
Short 5-pocket skirt in stretch, wide wale cotton corduroy with a zip fly. Unlined.
